settings.heading: Specifications
settings.content:
LIFX Color 800lm E26

Brightness: 800 Lumens
Colour rendering index(CRI): 80
Wattage Use: 9.0W at full brightness
Wattage Eq: 60W Incandescent
Wattage on Standby: Less than 0.5W
Voltage Range: AC 100-240V 50/60 Hz
Colour Temperature: 1500K to 9000K
Beam Angle: 235°
Dimming: Software dimming 1% -100%
Wi-Fi: 2.4GHz
Security: WPA, WPA2
Dims: 2.36in x 2.36in x 4.13in

LIFX Clean 1100lm E26

Brightness: 1100 Lumens
Colour rendering index(CRI): 80
Wattage Use: 11.5W at full brightness
Wattage Eq: 75W Incandescent
Wattage on Standby: Less than 0.5W
Voltage Range: AC 100-240V 50/60 Hz
Colour Temperature: 1500K to 9000K
Beam Angle: 210°
Dimming: Software dimming 1% -100%
Wi-Fi: 2.4GHz
Security: WPA, WPA2
Dims:2.48in x 2.48in x 4.53in

LIFX Lightstrip 80"
Brightness: 1400 Lumens
Colour rendering index(CRI): 80
Wattage Use: 17.0W at full brightness
Wattage Eq: 90W Incandescent
Wattage on Standby: Less than 0.5W
Voltage Range: AC 100-240V 50/60 Hz
Colour Temperature: 1500K to 9000K
Beam Angle: 120°
Dimming: Software dimming 1% -100%
Wi-Fi: 2.4GHz
Security: WPA, WPA2
Dims:78.74in x 0.47in x 0.16in

settings.heading: Antimicrobial Efficacy Test
settings.content: An Evaluation of the Antimicrobial Efficacy of HEV Light

settings.title: 1 x LIFX Color 800lm E26
settings.text: A compact smart light that packs a serious 800 lumen punch. Transport yourself into the world of your game by transforming your space. With vibrant colors, smart features like Scenes and Schedules, and integrations for voice control, you can create the fully immersive experience you’ve been waiting for.

settings.title: 1 x LIFX Clean 1100lm E26
settings.text: LIFX Clean is a powerful smart light that doubles as a daily disinfectant bulb. Use its bright white light at 6000K (the same color temperature as the sun) to enhance your gaming performance and improve focus. Then schedule a Clean Cycle to wipe out bacteria on your keyboard, controllers and headphones while you take a break.

settings.title: 1 x LIFX Lightstrip 40"
settings.text: A flexible LED strip with endless color options to set the mood to whatever game you choose to play. Place LIFX Lightstrip behind your monitor, TV screen or entertainment unit for bias lighting that immerses you into the narrative of your game, enhances colors and contrasts on the screen, and reduces eye strain and dryness.

Ask Google to control smart devices in your home. No matter where you are, get things done – whenever you want.

"Hey Google, dim the living room lights and turn on Netflix."

LIFX works with Amazon Alexa products to control your lights with your voice. No need to unlock your phone and open the app.

"Alexa... Set the living room to warm white.”

Turn your iPhone into a universal remote for your smart home with Apple HomeKit.

Say "Siri, I'm home," and have HomeKit unlock your door and set your LIFX lighting to your favourite scene.

settings.title: LIFX smart bulbs deliver excellent smart lighting
settings.text:
"They're really very good as smart bulbs, nailing the colour aspect perfectly, responding well to commands, and tying in neatly to your choice of smart assistant. The app offers one-touch control of your connected lights, and some very detailed control deeper down, and everything's easy to set up and get running."
Read more

settings.title: Best color-changing smart bulb
settings.text:
"Like I said, I think Lifx lights belong right at the top of your list if you're looking to add a smart pop of color to your home's lighting systems. The brand sells a variety of bulbs and smart lights that all put out bright, great-looking colors, all of which can connect with Alexa, Siri or Google Assistant with absolutely no need for a hub."

Read more

settings.title: LIFX smart bulbs deliver excellent smart lighting
settings.text:
"LIFX offers a plethora of smart light options; from color and white bulbs, that come both in full size and the more compact LIFX Mini design, as well as lightstrips, LIFX Beam - the brands own take on smart light wall art and LIFX Clean - a smart light that can also kill bacteria."

Read more
